page.title: 15Rodbourne - Parsloe Farm
page.content: {Parsloe farm}is 3.50 km south of {Malmesbury.}The farm house is over 215 years old.Mr Vincent's family has farmed it for 2 generations and he hopes his son will farm it after him. He employs 1 full time man.Mr Vincent has 85 Friesian milking cows and 135 calves & young cows.This farm has been affected by the{EEC milk quota.}Since 1984 he has reduced his herd from 100 to 85,the 15 cows were slaughtered for beef.Each cow gives an average of 5 gallons a day and a {CO-OP milk tanker collects it daily.The farm is 220 acres in area.It has 30 acres corn,100 acres silage and the rest is grazing. He hopes to cut another 50 acres of silage this year.He uses a lot of fertiliser for his intensive farming.
